org.jpac.plc

Class WriteRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpac.plc.Request
      • org.jpac.plc.WriteRequest

  • public abstract class WriteRequest
extends Request
    represents a write request. Can be added to a an instance of WriteMultipleData.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WriteRequest

        public WriteRequest()

      • WriteRequest

        public WriteRequest(Request.DATATYPE dataType,
                    Address address,
                    int dataOffset,
                    Data data)
             throws ValueOutOfRangeException,
                    IndexOutOfRangeException
        Parameters:
        dataType - actually two data types are supported: DATATYPE.BIT for accessing BOOL type data items and DATATYPE.BYTE for all other data types
        address - a fully qualified address of the data item to be retrieved (@link Address}
        dataOffset - the offset of the data item inside the local copy of the data (see parameter "data")
        Throws:
        ValueOutOfRangeException - thrown, if the combination of the given parameters is inconsistent
        IndexOutOfRangeException
